attributes.action: Turn the invincible aircrafts carrier in to a Landing Platform, Helicopter or landing platform dock
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Turn the invincible aircrafts carrier in to a Landing Platform, Helicopter or landing platform dock,
Which carry troops, equipment, vehicles, helicopters, and harriers. This would not cost to much and would be a big player in the royal navy. I also want the budget for the military mostly the navy to double so we can insure the protections of the British isle and are over seas colonies.
